name: FIN_ASST_CASE_ASSOC_TRKR
description: This table contains information on how financial assistance program trackers are linked to each other in a financial assistance case.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the financial assistance case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_PROGRAM_ID
columns.description: This item stores the financial assistance program for the associated trackers.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_PROGRAM_ID_PROGRAM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the financial assistance program record.
